Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Irregularly \Ir*reg"u*lar*ly\, adv. In an irregular manner. [1913 Webster]

irregularly adv 1: in an irregular manner; "the patient is breathing irregularly" [ant: {regularly}] 2: having an irregular form; "irregularly shaped solids" [ant: {regularly}] 3: in an irregular manner; "her letters arrived irregularly" [syn: {on an irregular basis}] [ant: {regularly}] 4: in an irregular manner; "the stomach mucosa was irregularly blackened"
